plot: Mami is an esper who after discovering her power tries to put it into good use by helping the people around her. She tries to keep her power a secret but is fortunate enough to have her genius friend Takahata to help her whenever she is in a fix.
opening_theme: "Teleportaion ~ Koi no Mikakunin" (テレポーテーション～恋の未確認) by Ushio Hashimoto (eps 1-107)
ending_theme: "I Like You kara I Love You" by Ushio Hashimoto (eps 108-119)
